location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘PLAN SHOWING SHATT EL ARAB FROM KURNA TO BASRA, AND RESPECTIVE POSITIONS APPROXIMATELY OF LYNCH DOCK AT MAGIL, THE BAGDAD RAILWAY MATERIAL DEPÔT, AND THE TOWN OF BASRA’

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Produced in Basra, Sept. 1912 and signed ‘Sd. F.E. Crow H. Ms. Consul’. Rough plan of area north of Basra with location of German Depot and British Consulate shown.In the bottom left-hand corner printed: ‘S.D.O. No. 606. Dec. 1912’.
